sentences.english: Their arms factory lies in range of high mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他们的武器工厂坐落在群山峻岭之中。

sentences.english: The Rocky Mountains have rugged mountains and roads.
sentences.chinese: 落基山脉有崇山峻岭和崎岖不平的道路。

sentences.english: Verse of the Tang Dynasty is the summit in Chinese literature and poetic craft.
sentences.chinese: 唐诗是中国文学的一个高峰，是诗歌艺术的峻岭。

sentences.english: Why, we'll be in sight of the Northern mountains then.
sentences.chinese: 晤，然后我们就会望见北方的崇山峻岭。

sentences.english: Baokang County, Hubei Province in China, everywhere that is the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在湖北省保康县，到处都是这样的崇山峻岭。

sentences.english: South Kaiyuan hole located at the Kaiyuan city south under approximately 10 kilometers high mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 开远南洞位于开远市南约10公里的崇山峻岭之下。

sentences.english: Foreign fighters must move carefully through those unforgiving mountains.
sentences.chinese: 外籍士兵必须小心翼翼地穿过那些丛山峻岭。

sentences.english: 14 for all the towering mountains and all the high hills
sentences.chinese: 又临到一切高山的峻岭。

sentences.english: Orchid Pavilion is rounded by mighty mountains, trees are flourishing, and bamboos are dense.
sentences.chinese: 兰亭这地方有崇山峻岭环抱，林木繁茂，竹篁幽密。

sentences.english: Zhongtian Gate mountains wide valley, surrounded by pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 中天门峻岭阔谷，楼阁簇拥。

sentences.english: Basha Miao Village is lying quietly, like a green leaf in the deep mountains.
sentences.chinese: 岜沙苗寨像一片绿叶静静的卧在崇山峻岭深处。

sentences.english: Sam crossed the majestic mountains to the valleys far below.
sentences.chinese: 山姆翻过丛山峻岭，到达那下面的河谷。

sentences.english: Is not this mountain like a flower, with its petals of hills.
sentences.chinese: 难道群山峻岭不正如花朵一样。

sentences.english: Along the way are remote mountains, deep valleys, so green, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 沿途崇山峻岭，沟谷深陷，绿水青山，美轮美奂。

sentences.english: The Chinese Rock Penjing pictured is made up of Phillite rock, up to 30" high, resting on a 40" white marble tray.
sentences.chinese: 高耸的岩石组合成崇山峻岭安放在洁白大理石盘之上。

sentences.english: It is surrounded by mountains on three sides, altitude 2483 meters.
sentences.chinese: 它三面被崇山峻岭环抱，海拔2483米。

definition: the peaks of a mountain range
